quests.desc: Welcome to another profound session of TextWorld! First step, travel north. With that accomplished, pick up the spherical latchkey from the bookshelf in the study. With the spherical latchkey, try to move south. Then, make absolutely sure that the spherical gateway is unlocked. After that, ensure that the spherical gateway inside the lounge is open. And then, make an attempt to take a trip east. That done, head east. Next, try to go to the east. Okay, and then, make absolutely sure that the type D locker is wide open. Then, take the tablet from the type D locker. That's it!
commands: unlock spherical gateway with spherical latchkey
take tablet from type D locker
unlock spherical gateway with spherical latchkey
take tablet from type D locker

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You are in a bedchamber. An usual one. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You make out a type D locker.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The type D locker contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The type D locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You scan the room for a stand, and you find a stand. [if there is something on the s_1]On the stand you can see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if] You see a shelf. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the shelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a restroom.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in a place we're calling a bedroom. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] typical looking suitcase in the room.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_1]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The suitcase is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] spherical gateway leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You arrive in a recreation zone. A standard one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] lavender scented box.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The lavender scented box contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The lavender scented box is empty![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You make another one of your grand eccentric entrances into a chamber. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] rectangular safe nearby.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The rectangular safe contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The rectangular safe is empty![end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a bed. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! The bed is typical.[if there is something on the s_3] On the bed you can make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bed.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the attic. The room is well lit.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a workshop, cool, but is it standard? You better believe it is.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a desk. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. The desk is standard.[if there is something on the s_4] On the desk you can make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a washroom. Let's see what's in here.

 You can make out a board. [if there is something on the s_5]On the board you can make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You make out a bench. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the bench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]However, the bench, like an empty bench, has nothing on it. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a bench in a room.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchenette. A standard kind of place.

 You can make out a plate. [if there is something on the s_7]On the plate you can make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Silly plate, silly, empty, good for nothing plate.[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a chair. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! [if there is something on the s_8]On the chair you can make out [a list of things on the s_8]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
Ah, the cellar. This is some kind of cellar, really great ordinary vibes in this place, a wonderful ordinary atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bar. An usual one.

 You make out a mantle. [if there is something on the s_9]On the mantle you make out [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You are in an office. An ordinary kind of place. You begin looking for stuff.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's an armchair. The armchair is standard.[if there is something on the s_10] On the armchair you can make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10] But there isn't a thing on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a lounge, cool, but is it normal? You better believe it is.

 You can make out a type T chest.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The type T chest contains [a list of things in the c_4]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The type T chest is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] spherical gateway leading east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
Ah, the shower. This is some kind of shower, really great standard vibes in this place, a wonderful standard atmosphere. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
I am sorry to announce that you are now in the studio.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.desc:
You are in a steam room. A standard one. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You're now in a canteen. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can make out a platter. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a platter? [if there is something on the s_11]You see [a list of things on the s_11] on the platter. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11]However, the platter, like an empty platter, has nothing on it.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You've entered a kitchen.



There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study. A normal kind of place.

 You can see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest, which looks ordinary, here.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_5]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The chest is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can see a bookshelf. The bookshelf is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the bookshelf you make out [a list of things on the s_0]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a cubicle.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south.

walkthrough: unlock spherical gateway with spherical latchkey
take tablet from type D locker

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First, it would be a great idea if you could attempt to take a trip north. With that done, retrieve the spherical latchkey from the bookshelf in the study. After picking up the spherical latchkey, try to venture south. Okay, and then, assure that the spherical gateway is unlocked. And then, ensure that the spherical gateway within the lounge is open. And then, make an effort to go to the east. Then, venture east. With that done, move east. With that over with, ensure that the type D locker within the bedchamber is open. And then, pick up the tablet from the type D locker inside the bedchamber. Alright, thanks!
